text:
64 yom with HTN, DMII, HLD, morbid obesity, p/w findings c/w
   pancreatitis, need to be evaled for question ERCP prior to questionable
   surgery for cholecystitis.
   Pancreatitis, acute/Cholecystitis
   Assessment:
   Pt rec
d from OSH tonight with acute gallstone pancreatitis
   Action:
   Started Unasyn despite reported allergy to PCN, MRI checklist
   completed, fent IVP prn
   Response:
   Afebrile, no reaction to unasyn, WBC 23->_______, abd obese, soft,
   hypoactive BS, RUQ/LQ pain persists but relieved with fentanyl prn,
   resulting in pain [**2-7**] which is acceptable
   Plan:
   MRCP today, follow fever trend, monitor labs, continue abx, continue
   pain mgt
   Renal failure, acute (Acute renal failure, ARF)
   Assessment:
   ARF [**1-30**] to dehydration, HCT 56.5, BUN/Cr  33/1.7
   Action:
   FB total _____ NS, am labd drawn and pending, renally dosing meds
   Response:
   Am results pending, LS remain clear with no SOB/distress
   Plan:
   IV hydration as tolerated
